documents.title: Sign Me Up!
documents.overviewSubtitle: Core ML and Vision with ASL.
documents.detailSubtitle: Core ML and Vision with ASL.
documents.description: A demo book from WWDC2019 that uses the Vision framework and Core ML framework to recognize sign language and apply custom drawings.

documents.title: Marble Mania
documents.overviewSubtitle: A fun side-scrolling infinite running game.
documents.detailSubtitle: A fun side-scrolling infinite running game.
documents.description:
This is a playground book derived from the blank template in Swift Playgrounds 3. The individual pages each demonstrate some of the steps leading up the last page which runs the game. 
Tilt the iPad to control a marble rolling through an obstacle course with holes you should avoid. If you fall out into a hole, tap to start over. Rolling faster increases the score.
